fabrication.name: Forté
fabrication.descp: Generative design that combines user sketching and topology optimization.

fabrication.name: Façade
fabrication.descp: Making appliances accessible with 3D printed Braille buttons.

fabrication.descp: A design tool for specifying, generating, and customizing 3d printable adaptations on everyday objects.

fabrication.name: Encore
fabrication.descp: 3D printed augmentation of everyday objects with printed-over, affixed and interlocked attachment.

fabrication.name: 3D Printed Hair
fabrication.descp: A technique to print hair-like structures using commodity FDM printer.

interactiontechniques.name: Air+Touch
interactiontechniques.descp: Combining in-air gesture and touch input above mobile devices.

interactiontechniques.descp: An eyes-free text entry technique for ultra-small interfaces

interactiontechniques.name: Swipeglass
interactiontechniques.descp: Enabling typing on smart eyewear with simple tapping and swiping gestures.

interactiontechniques.name: Locus
interactiontechniques.descp: Bootstrapping user-defined body tapping recognition with offline-learned probabilistic representation.

interactiontechniques.name: Around-Body
interactiontechniques.descp: Tracking a commodity smart phone's position around a user's body.

interactiontechniques.name: Body-Centric
interactiontechniques.descp: A series of exploration of interacting in the space on and around our body.

interactiontechniques.name: Tablet+Stylus
interactiontechniques.descp: Grip and motion sensing while naturally manipulating tablet and stylus devices.

interactiontechniques.name: Pen+Motion
interactiontechniques.descp: A pen with embedded IMU that supports various techniques and motion gestures.

interactiontechniques.name: Skin Buttons
interactiontechniques.descp: Tiny projectors integrated into a smart watch to render icons on the skin

interactiontechniques.name: SweepSense
interactiontechniques.descp: Sensing techniques that can automatically pause the music as you pull your earplugs out.

interactiontechniques.name: Twist 'n' Knock
interactiontechniques.descp: A one-handed gesture for smart watches.

interactiontechniques.name: FatThumb
interactiontechniques.descp: Thumb-based interaction by detecting the contact size.

interactiontechniques.name: Spalendar
interactiontechniques.descp: Visualizing calendar data by showing people moving between places.

interactiontechniques.name: Maestro

internetofthings.descp: An input framework for users to create cross-device gestures.

internetofthings.name: VisLens
internetofthings.descp: A screen reader for physical interfaces based on crowd-labeld information.

internetofthings.name: Snap to It
internetofthings.descp: Take a picture of an appliance and control it from your smart phone.

sideprojects.name: b-reader

sideprojects.name: Nudge
